eas_text: A civil authority has issued A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST for the following counties or areas: Maine; at 10:26 AM ON JAN 7, 2026 Effective until 10:41 AM. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a coordinated monthly test of the Emergency Alert System for the State of Maine. If this were an actual emergency, official information would follow the alert tones.
